title: ‘The Secret Floor’: Where Time Travel Meets History to Teach Children About Nazi Germany
summary: Director Norbert Lechner discusses the inspirations for the movie, which next screens at Tallinn, the role of 'Back to the Future,' and how the ghosts of the Nazi past reared their heads at a recent festival.

title: Cher Gets Candid About Aging: “I Hate It”
summary: The 79-year-old music icon admits she does not feel "wiser" compared to when she was younger.
